devdoc.author: The Sandbox
devdoc.details: Implements the following features: - Upgradeable proxy pattern - Two-step ownership transfer - OpenSea and ERC2981 royalty standards - ERC4906 metadata update notifications - ERC165 interface detection - ERC2771 meta-transaction support - Burn tracking for game access control - ERC20-based minting with approveAndCall pattern - Batch minting and transfer operations

AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

params.amount: amount to be checked if can be minted
params.wallet: wallet to be checked if it can mint

ECDSAInvalidSignatureLength(uint256).details: The signature has an invalid length.

ECDSAInvalidSignatureS(bytes32).details: The signature has an S value that is in the upper half order.

ERC2981InvalidDefaultRoyalty(uint256,uin.details: The default royalty set is invalid (eg. (numerator / denominator) >= 1).

ERC2981InvalidDefaultRoyaltyReceiver(add.details: The default royalty receiver is invalid.

ERC2981InvalidTokenRoyalty(uint256,uint2.details: The royalty set for an specific `tokenId` is invalid (eg. (numerator / denominator) >= 1).

ERC2981InvalidTokenRoyaltyReceiver(uint2.details: The royalty receiver for `tokenId` is invalid.

ERC721IncorrectOwner(address,uint256,add.details: Indicates an error related to the ownership over a particular token. Used in transfers.

params.owner: Address of the current owner of a token.
params.sender: Address whose tokens are being transferred.

ERC721InsufficientApproval(address,uint2.details: Indicates a failure with the `operator`s approval. Used in transfers.

params.operator: Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner.

ERC721InvalidApprover(address).details: Indicates a failure with the `approver` of a token to be approved. Used in approvals.

ERC721InvalidOperator(address).details: Indicates a failure with the `operator` to be approved. Used in approvals.

params.operator: Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner.

ERC721InvalidOwner(address).details: Indicates that an address can't be an owner. For example, `address(0)` is a forbidden owner in EIP-20. Used in balance queries.

params.owner: Address of the current owner of a token.

ERC721InvalidReceiver(address).details: Indicates a failure with the token `receiver`. Used in transfers.

params.receiver: Address to which tokens are being transferred.

ERC721InvalidSender(address).details: Indicates a failure with the token `sender`. Used in transfers.

params.sender: Address whose tokens are being transferred.

ERC721NonexistentToken(uint256).details: Indicates a `tokenId` whose `owner` is the zero address.

EnforcedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is paused.

ExpectedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is not paused.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

params.allowedToExecuteMint: token address that is used for payments and that is allowed to execute mint

params.baseURI: an URI that will be used as the base for token URI

params.signAddress: signer address that is allowed to create mint signatures

params.signatureId: the ID of the provided signature

params.symbol: token symbol of the ERC721 token

params.mintTreasury: collection treasury address (where the payments are sent)

params.waveMaxTokensOverall: the allowed number of tokens to be minted in this wave (cumulative by all minting wallets)
params.waveMaxTokensPerWallet: max tokens to buy, per wallet in a given wave

params.maxSupply: max supply of tokens to be allowed to be minted per contract
params.totalSupply: amount of tokens minted till now

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

params.isAgentControlled: true if the wallet is agent-controlled

params.newToken: new address that is used for payments and that is allowed to execute mint
params.oldToken: old address that is used for payments and that is allowed to execute mint

Approval(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `owner` enables `approved` to manage the `tokenId` token.

ApprovalForAll(address,address,bool).details: Emitted when `owner` enables or disables (`approved`) `operator` to manage all of its assets.

params.newBaseURI: new URI that will be used as the base for token metadata URI
params.oldBaseURI: old URI that will be used as the base for token metadata URI

BatchMetadataUpdate(uint256,uint256).details: This event emits when the metadata of a range of tokens is changed. So that the third-party platforms such as NFT market could timely update the images and related attributes of the NFTs.

ContractInitialized(string,string,string.details: emitted at proxy startup, only once

params.allowedToExecuteMint: token address that is used for payments and that is allowed to execute mint
params.baseURI: an URI that will be used as the base for token URI
params.maxSupply: max supply of tokens to be allowed to be minted per contract
params.maxTokensPerWallet: maximum amount of tokens that can be minted per wallet across all waves
params.mintTreasury: collection treasury address (where the payments are sent)
params.name: name of the ERC721 token
params.signAddress: signer address that is allowed to create mint signatures
params.symbol: token symbol of the ERC721 token

params.registry: address of the registry to set
params.subscriptionOrRegistrant: address to subscribe or copy entries from

params.feeNumerator: percentage of the royalties in feeDenominator units

Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

params.newMaxSupply: new maximum amount of tokens that can be minted
params.oldMaxSupply: old maximum amount of tokens that can be minted

MetadataUpdate(uint256).details: This event emits when the metadata of a token is changed. So that the third-party platforms such as NFT market could timely update the images and related attributes of the NFT.

params.newRegistry: address of the new registry to set

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

params.personalizationMask: the exact personalization that was done, as a custom meaning bit-mask
params.tokenId: id of the token which had the personalization done

params.purchaseAgent: the address of the purchase agent

params.newSignAddress: new signer address that is allowed to create mint signatures
params.oldSignAddress: old signer address that is allowed to create mint signatures

params.burner: the owner that burned the token
params.tokenId: the id of the token that was burned

params.feeNumerator: percentage of the royalties in feeDenominator units

Transfer(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `tokenId` token is transferred from `from` to `to`.

params.newTreasury: new collection treasury address (where the payments are sent)
params.oldTreasury: old collection treasury address (where the payments are sent)

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

params.wallet: the wallet address of the receiver

params.waveMaxTokens: the allowed number of tokens to be minted in this wave (cumulative by all minting wallets)
params.waveMaxTokensToBuy: max tokens to buy, per wallet in a given wave
params.waveSingleTokenPrice: the price to mint a token in a given wave, in wei

acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

returns._0: Address of the payment token contract.

approve(address,uint256).details: Overrides ERC721 implementation to add operator filtering.

returns._0: Base URI string.

batchMint(uint256,(address,uint256)[]).details: Owner-only function for airdrops. Bypasses wave restrictions but respects maxSupply.

params.wallets: Array of recipient addresses and mint amounts.
params.waveIndex: Index of the wave configuration to use.

batchTransferFrom(address,address,uint25.details: Requires approval or ownership. Does not verify receiver compatibility.

params.ids: Array of token IDs to transfer.

burn(uint256).details: Requires burning to be enabled. Caller must own or be approved for token.

params.tokenId: ID of the token to burn.

cancelWave(uint256).details: Cannot cancel the most recent wave to prevent disruption of mint function.

params.waveIndex: Index of the wave to cancel.

returns._0: Current blockchain network ID.

disableBurning().details: Reverts if burning is already disabled. Only callable by owner.

enableBurning().details: Reverts if burning is already enabled. Only callable by owner.

feeDenominator().details: Used in conjunction with royalty fee numerator.

returns._0: Fee denominator value (10000 for basis points).
the type of signature used

initialize((address,string,string,string.details: External initialization entry point following the upgradeable pattern.

params.params: Struct containing all initialization parameters, see InitializationParams for details.

returns._0: True if the wallet is controlled by the purchase agent.
True if token burning is enabled.
Reason code indicating mint permission status.

params.forwarder: the address ot the trusted forwarder to check

returns._0: true if forwarder is the trusted forwarder address
Maximum number of tokens that can be minted.
Maximum tokens allowed per wallet across all waves.

mint(address,uint256,uint256,bytes).details: Only callable by allowedToExecuteMint contract. Uses the most recent wave configuration.

params.signatureId: Unique identifier for the minting signature.

returns._0: Address receiving minting payments.
Number of tokens minted by the address.
the operatorFilterRegistry address

operatorPersonalize(uint256,uint256).details: Owner-only function for game-driven trait updates.

params.tokenId: ID of the token to personalize.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Reverts if contract is already paused. Only callable by owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

returns._0: Bit mask of token's personalization traits.

personalize(uint256,uint256,uint256,byte.details: Caller must be token owner. Emits MetadataUpdate event.

params.signatureId: Unique identifier for the personalization signature.
params.tokenId: ID of the token to personalize.

returns._0: Address that can transfer tokens on behalf of agent-controlled wallets.

register(address,bool).details: Pass address(0) to register without subscription. Only callable by owner.

params.subscribe: True to subscribe, false to copy the list.
params.subscriptionOrRegistrantToCopy: Address to copy or subscribe to.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

resetTokenRoyalty(uint256).details: Returns token to default royalty configuration. Only callable by owner.

reveal(uint256,uint256,bytes).details: Emits MetadataUpdate for marketplace integration. Caller must be token owner.

params.signatureId: Unique identifier for the reveal signature.
params.tokenId: ID of the token to refresh.

royaltyInfo(uint256,uint256).details: Returns how much royalty is owed and to whom, based on a sale price that may be denominated in any unit of exchange. The royalty amount is denominated and should be paid in that same unit of exchange.

safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,ui.details: Verifies receiver contract compatibility. Requires approval or ownership.

params.ids: Array of token IDs to transfer.

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: Overrides ERC721 implementation to add operator filtering.

setAllowedExecuteMint(address).details: Must be a valid contract address. Only callable by owner.

params.minterToken: Address of the ERC20 token contract.

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: Overrides ERC721 implementation to add operator filtering.

params.approved: True to approve, false to revoke.

setBaseURI(string).details: Emits BatchMetadataUpdate for the entire collection. Only callable by owner.

params.agentControlledFlags: Flags indicating if wallets are agent-controlled.

setMaxSupply(uint256).details: Must be greater than current supply. Only callable by owner.

setMaxTokensPerWallet(uint256).details: Must be greater than zero and less than maxSupply. Only callable by owner.

setOperatorRegistry(address).details: Used for marketplace filtering. Only callable by owner.

params._purchaseAgent: The address of the purchase agent.

setTokenRoyalty(uint256,address,uint96).details: Overrides default royalty for the specified token. Only callable by owner.

setTreasury(address).details: Reverts if treasury address is zero. Only callable by owner.

setTrustedForwarder(address).details: Set to address(0) to disable meta-transactions. Only callable by owner.

setupWave(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Validates wave parameters against global limits and current supply.

params._waveMaxTokensOverall: Maximum tokens that can be minted in this wave.
params._waveMaxTokensPerWallet: Maximum tokens per wallet for this wave.
params._waveSingleTokenPrice: Price per token in wave, denominated in allowedToExecuteMint token.

returns._0: the signer address
True if interface is supported.
Current number of minted tokens.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Overrides ERC721 implementation to add operator filtering.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

returns._0: the trusted forwarder address

unpause().details: Reverts if contract is not paused. Only callable by owner.

returns._0: Number of minting waves configured.
Maximum tokens allowed in the wave.
Maximum tokens allowed per wallet in the wave.

params.signatureId: Unique identifier for the minting signature.
params.waveIndex: Index of the wave configuration to use.

returns._0: Number of tokens minted by the address in the wave.
Price per token in the wave's payment token.
Total tokens minted in the wave.

devdoc.title: NFTCollection

CannotMint(uint8,address,uint256,uint256.notice: The operation failed because the wave is completed

ContractNotConfigured().notice: The operation failed the wave index is zero, no wave was ever configured

EnforcedBurn().notice: The operation failed because burning is enabled.

ExpectedBurn().notice: The operation failed because burning is disabled.

InvalidAllowedToExecuteMint(address).notice: The operation failed because the allowedToExecuteMint is not a contract or wrong

InvalidBaseTokenURI(string).notice: The operation failed because the base token uri is empty.

InvalidBatchData().notice: The operation failed because the batch data len is zero

InvalidMaxTokensPerWallet(uint256,uint25.notice: The operation failed because the max tokens per wallet is invalid

InvalidName(string).notice: The operation failed because the token name is invalid

InvalidSignAddress(address).notice: The operation failed because the signAddress is wrong

InvalidSignature(uint256).notice: The operation failed because signature is invalid or it was already used

InvalidSymbol(string).notice: The operation failed because the token symbol is invalid

InvalidTreasury(address).notice: The operation failed because the treasury is wrong

InvalidWaveData(uint256,uint256).notice: The operation failed because the wave arguments are wrong

LowMaxSupply(uint256,uint256).notice: The operation failed because the maxSupply is lower than totalSupply

OperatorNotAllowed(address).notice: the caller is not the operator

WaveMaxTokensHigherThanGlobalMax(uint256.notice: The operation failed because the wave max tokens per wallet is higher than the global max tokens per wallet

AgentControlledSet(address,address,bool).notice: Event emitted when a wallet is marked as agent-controlled

AllowedExecuteMintSet(address,address,ad.notice: Event emitted when an address was set as allowed to mint

BaseURISet(address,string,string).notice: Event emitted when the base token URI for the contract was set or changed

ContractInitialized(string,string,string.notice: Event emitted when the contract was initialized.

ContractRegistered(address,address,addre.notice: emitted when the contract is registered into the registry

DefaultRoyaltyReset(address).notice: Event emitted when default royalties are reset

DefaultRoyaltySet(address,address,uint96.notice: Event emitted when a token personalization was made.

MaxSupplySet(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Event emitted when the max supply is set or changed

MaxTokensPerWalletSet(address,uint256,ui.notice: Event emitted when the max tokens per wallet is set

OperatorRegistrySet(address,address,addr.notice: emitted when a registry is set

Personalized(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Event emitted when a token personalization was made.

PurchaseAgentSet(address,address).notice: Event emitted when the purchase agent is set

SignAddressSet(address,address,address).notice: Event emitted when the signer address was set or changed

TokenBurned(address,uint256,address).notice: event emitted when a token was burned

TokenBurningDisabled(address).notice: event emitted when token burning was disabled

TokenBurningEnabled(address).notice: event emitted when token burning was enabled

TokenRoyaltyReset(address,uint256).notice: Event emitted when default royalties are reset

TokenRoyaltySet(address,uint256,address,.notice: Event emitted when a token personalization was made.

TreasurySet(address,address,address).notice: Event emitted when the treasury address was saved

TrustedForwarderSet(address,address,addr.notice: emitted when the trusted forwarder is set

WaveMint(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Event emitted when a wave mint is completed

WaveSetup(address,uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Event emitted when a wave was set up

allowedToExecuteMint().notice: Returns the ERC20 token used for minting payments.

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approves an operator to transfer a specific token.

baseTokenURI().notice: Returns the base URI for token metadata.

batchMint(uint256,(address,uint256)[]).notice: Performs batch minting for multiple addresses.

cancelWave(uint256).notice: Deactivates a minting wave by setting its maximum tokens to zero.

feeDenominator().notice: Returns the fee denominator for royalty calculations.

getSignatureType(uint256).notice: returns the type of signature used for a specific Id

initialize((address,string,string,string.notice: Initializes the NFT collection with configuration parameters.

isAgentControlled(address).notice: Returns if a wallet is controlled by the purchase agent.

isMintDenied(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Checks if an address can mint tokens in a specific wave.

isTrustedForwarder(address).notice: Indicates whether any particular address is the trusted forwarder.

maxSupply().notice: Returns the maximum token supply cap.

maxTokensPerWallet().notice: Returns the global maximum tokens per wallet limit.

mint(address,uint256,uint256,bytes).notice: Mints tokens using the latest wave configuration.

mintTreasury().notice: Returns the treasury address for minting payments.

mintedCount(address).notice: Returns the number of tokens minted by an address.

operatorPersonalize(uint256,uint256).notice: Updates token traits with privileged access.

personalizationOf(uint256).notice: Retrieves personalization traits for a token.

personalize(uint256,uint256,uint256,byte.notice: Updates token traits using a bit mask.

register(address,bool).notice: Registers the contract with OpenSea's operator filter registry.

reveal(uint256,uint256,bytes).notice: Triggers metadata refresh for a specific token.

safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,ui.notice: Safely transfers multiple tokens between addresses.

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.notice: Safely transfers a token between addresses.

setAllowedExecuteMint(address).notice: Updates the ERC20 token contract used for minting payments.

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).notice: Sets approval for an operator to manage caller's tokens.

setBaseURI(string).notice: Updates the base URI for token metadata.

setBatchAgentControlled(address[],bool[].notice: Sets wallets as agent-controlled by the purchase agent.

setDefaultRoyalty(address,uint96).notice: Sets default royalty information for all tokens.

setMaxTokensPerWallet(uint256).notice: Updates the maximum tokens per wallet limit.

setOperatorRegistry(address).notice: Sets the operator filter registry address.

setSignAddress(address).notice: Updates the signing address for validating operations.

setTokenRoyalty(uint256,address,uint96).notice: Sets royalty information for a specific token.

setTreasury(address).notice: Updates the treasury address for minting payments.

setTrustedForwarder(address).notice: Updates the trusted forwarder for meta-transactions.

signAddress().notice: return the address from which all signatures must come from this specific address, otherwise they are invalid

totalSupply().notice: Returns the current total supply of minted tokens.

trustedForwarder().notice: Returns the address of the trusted forwarder.

waveCount().notice: Returns the total number of configured waves.

waveMaxTokensOverall(uint256).notice: Returns the maximum tokens allowed for a specific wave.

waveMaxTokensPerWallet(uint256).notice: Returns the maximum tokens per wallet for a specific wave.

waveMint(address,uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: Mints tokens using a specific wave configuration.

waveOwnerToClaimedCounts(uint256,address.notice: Returns the number of tokens minted by an address in a specific wave.

waveSingleTokenPrice(uint256).notice: Returns the token price for a specific wave.

waveTotalMinted(uint256).notice: Returns the total tokens minted in a specific wave.

userdoc.notice: Implements an upgradeable ERC721 contract for Avatar NFT collections.
